title: Ticket #7603: Support builds and tests in Docker
description: Both the build and test glue and the tests themselves need some tweaks to support running in CHTC Docker jobs.
remarks:
2020-Apr-17 20:24:13 by tlmiller:
These are all internal changes to the Metronome glue, which we can be certain no one else uses. There is therefore no needs for (further) review or (any other) documentation.

(There's also two changes to the tests, which are not (yet) public, either.)
